attributes.action: EpiPens available in public and food spaces for allergy emergencies.
attributes.additional_details: To save lives from known and unknown allergy-related risks.
attributes.background: EpiPens could be made available in public areas and food spaces by securing them in locked containers. Access to these containers could be granted through a code provided by 111. This system would help assess the necessity of using an EpiPen and also provide guidance on its correct administration.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725555
